text: Munjaneyu sanje hottinallu tam'modeyana meccugeyannu apeksisutta avanannu prarthisuttiruva janarannu nivu duragolisabedi. Avara vicaraneya kuritada yava honeyu nim'ma melilla. Hageye nim'ma vicaraneya kuritada yavude hone avara melilla. Nivinnu avarannu dura golisidare, akramavesagidavara salige seruviri
